page.title: 17A TYPICAL SCHOOLDAY - 1985
page.content: AFTER REGISTRATION WE HAvE ART,THIS WEEK WE HAD TO INVENT A BOARD GAME,MINE WAS FULL OF MONSTERS.THEN WE HAD PLAYTIME AND AFTER PLAYTIME I HAD MATHS, AFTER 30 MINUTES I WAS FED UP WITH A'S, B'S AND X'S.IT WAS DINNER NEXT AND THEN SCIENCE,I WAS REALLY AHEAD IN OUR CIRCUIT WORK.THAT LESSON I ENJOYED. AFTER PLAY WE HAD P.E AND I WAS REALLY TIRED AFTER DOING 50 PRESS-UPS. WE THEN HAD TO RUN 10 CIRCUITS OF THE GYMNASIUM. MR. PETERS THEN SPLIT US UP INTO GROUPS AND WE HAD TO DO BASKETBALL SKILLS. DRAMA FOLLOWED AND WE HAD TO ACT OUT A MOUNTAIN RESCUE SCENE IN OUR PLAY; I WAS 1 OF THE MOUNTAIN RESCUE PEOPLE. THEN AT THE END OF SCHOOL I JUST GOT MY COAT AND WENT TO THE BUS STOP.
